member.name: T:FalconDatabase.Enums.DamageDataType
member.summary: The types of damage a Weapon can cause to a target.

member.name: F:FalconDatabase.Enums.DamageDataType.NoDamage
member.summary: Weapon causes no significant damage.

member.name: F:FalconDatabase.Enums.DamageDataType.PenetrationDam
member.summary: Weapon causes penetration damage. Effective against hardened targets.

member.name: F:FalconDatabase.Enums.DamageDataType.HighExplosiveDam
member.summary: Weapon detonates an explosion. Effective against soft or area targets.

member.name: F:FalconDatabase.Enums.DamageDataType.HeaveDam
member.summary: Weapon causes heave damage leaving craters. Effective against Runways.

member.name: F:FalconDatabase.Enums.DamageDataType.IncendairyDam
member.summary: Weapon causes heat or burning damage. Effective against troops and other soft targets.

member.name: F:FalconDatabase.Enums.DamageDataType.ProximityDam
member.summary: Weapon detonates an explosion when it reaches a certain proximity. Effective against fast moving targets, such as aircraft.

member.name: F:FalconDatabase.Enums.DamageDataType.KineticDam
member.summary: Weapon fires a projective to damage the target with an impact. Effective against soft and moderately hardened targets.

member.name: F:FalconDatabase.Enums.DamageDataType.HydrostaticDam
member.summary: Weapon causes damage by detonating an underwater explosion. Effective against sea vehicles..

returns.para: if the caller has the required permissions and contains the name of an existing file which is successfully parsed; otherwise, .

member.name: M:FalconDatabase.Files.GameFile.ToString

summary.para: Formats the data contained within the object into Readable Text.
Readable Text does not always match the underlying file format and should not be used to save text based files such as .ini, .lst, or .txtpb files.
Instead, use Write() to format all text or binary data for writing to a file.
